heading: Content Block 1
summary: Medical assistance offered by IOM Romania to refugees from UkraineRepresentatives of the International Organization for Migration in Romania - IOM Romania provide free medical care to Ukrainians and refugees from other countries.Read more

heading: Content Block 2
summary: Free medical consultations from the Ukrainian clinic MedZirkaThe Ukrainian network of family medicine clinics MedZirka offers free medical services online and offline. After filling in the declaration, you can get free consultations from a family doctor, therapist or pediatrician.Read more

heading: Content Block 3
summary: Free medical care at the Health Promotion Center from the Red CrossRed Cross Romania, with the support of the French Red Cross, opened aHealth Promotion Centerin Bucharest, where every refugee from Ukraine can receive free medical consultations and access to some medical services.Read more
